review: Just received my firestick yesterday and no matter what I do, it will not find my network... or any other for that matter.  We have no problem with using WiFi with our phones, surface pro... everything else works just fine.  We even tried using our phone as a hotspot.  Nothing!!  We have tried everything that we read and nothing is working.  We did try it at another location first (husband's work) and it did find the network there.  Does it save this information and it is still looking for that same info??? ANY help would be greatly appreciated.
author: Tracey

review: Love this! I don't use it as often as I would like to, as the only TV it hooks up to is my bedroom TV, and I don't spend much time in there...but it will come in very handy when we get another TV with an HDMI port, or if we move the current TV to a more frequently trafficked area of the house.
